page.title: 06Education in Hexham
page.content: All the schools in Hexham,except Sele First and Croft House private school are in our block.The schools are {Hexham}East(see page 3)and{St.Marys {R.C.First,Hexham Middle and St.Joseph R.C.Middle,and at the top of the pyramid is{Queen Elizabeths High {school.Hackwood park}is part boarding school for children with moderate learning difficulties,and{Priory {School}is for children with severe learning{difficulties.Duke's House Wood is a field studies and outdoor activities centre. {St. Mary's R.C.First School}is next to the Roman Catholic Church of St. Mary's.There are 170 pupils from 41/2 to 9 years old.There is a pre-school play group,and the children go on to St.Joseph's R.C.Middle School.5 teachers teach about 34 pupils each who come from mainly Catho
